title: New Bosch Tour+ eBike Tech Optimizes Range, Cuts Toggling
content:
Do you want eMTB software that only helps you when you need it? Maybe something that optimizes range so you can get further into the gnar? Bosch has you covered with its new Tour+, introduced in early July. The programming assists in the choppy stuff but automatically backs off when you’re in the flat. The […]
